professional_summary: Experienced Office Administrator with expertise in office management, security protocols, talent acquisition, and event planning. Skilled in conducting research and implementing cost containment measures.

key_responsibilities: Created and vetted annual security survey for over 3
Managed office functionality including cost containment measures.

Reconciled finances using QuickBooks from build sites.

Presented research findings on various topics.
